name: Evolution (itch) (Collin Visser)
description:
Game made for Go Godot Jam 3

Theme EVOLUTION

This is a very basic tower defense game where the enemies evolove and become resistant to you elemental damage. You need to change up the attacks to beat the level

space to pause game
Drag cards from your had to Tower Positions 

Drag card to upgrade your towers

Art by Kenny

Sound from packs
